Internet Remarks: Tucked into the hillside in a storybook setting of majestic trees, privacy hedging, and meditative spaces, this lovingly cared-for character home in Cates Hill offers comfort, coziness, and convenience. Inspired by the ‘Not So Big House’ concept that values quality over quantity, you’ll find large wood-framed windows and doors, and layering of spaces that make the home to feel comfortable and spacious. Living/dining/kitchen are on the main floor. Indoor/outdoor living is at its best with French doors that open wide to a viewscape of mature trees, mountains and ocean. The tall, curved shiplap ceiling in the upper floor master suite is an unexpected surprise, as is the bonus 'loft within a loft' space. Downstairs you’ll find a 2nd bedroom, full bath, and family room large enough for a 3rd bedroom/office. Sliding doors lead to the peaceful garden sanctuary. Within walking distance of trailheads, the ferry, schools, shops, and the future health and community centres, there’s no better place to be on Bowen Island.
